description: This file defines an interface for external integration adapters, such as GitHub, Jira, or Slack, specifying methods for connection, synchronization, and identification.

classes.name: IntegrationAdapter
classes.description: Interface for external integration implementations, including methods for key retrieval, connection management, and synchronization.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description: Returns the identifier key for the integration, e.g., 'github'.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes connection using provided configuration JSON, typically for OAuth or credentials setup.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Terminates the connection to the external service.

methods.name: sync
methods.description: Fetches the latest activity from the external service and updates internal data stores.
